articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Up to 4 in 10 people could develop dementia after 55. How can you lower your risk? - MLive.com
articles.description: New research suggests that Americans' risk for developing dementia over a lifetime may be higher than previously thought.
articles.content:
By LAURAN NEERGAARD AP Medical Writer
WASHINGTON (AP) About a million Americans a year are expected to develop dementia by 2060, roughly double todays toll, researchers reported Monday.

articles.title: In Photos: Mars Devoured By ‘Wolf Moon’ In Stunning Sight For U.S. Sky-Watchers - Forbes
articles.description: January’s full moon, the “Wolf Moon,” rose alongside Mars at its brightest, occulting it for a short period as seen from North America. Here are the best images.
articles.content: The first full moon of the 2025 called 'Wolf Moon' that seen next to Mars rises over the sky during ... [+] a lunar occultation of Mars in Charlotte, United States on January 13, 2025. The next favor… [+3835 chars]
